content.speaker: Unknown
content.text:
Under clause 9 of rule XXI, lists or statements on congressional 
earmarks, limited tax benefits, or limited tariff benefits were 
submitted as follows:

                          Offered By Mr. Neal

       The provisions that warranted a referral to the Committee 
     on Ways and Means in H.R. 5687 do not contain any 
     congressional earmarks, limited tax benefits, or limited 
     tariff benefits as defined in clause 9 rule XXI.

                         Offered By Mr. Yarmuth

       The provisions that warranted a referral to the Committee 
     on the Budget in H.R. 5687 do not contain any congressional 
     earmarks, limited tax benefits, or limited tariff benefits as 
     defined in clause 9 of rule XXI.
       The amendment to be offered by Representative Morelle to 
     H.R. 2474, the Protecting the Right to Organize Act of 2019, 
     does not contain any congressional earmarks, limited tax 
     benefits, or limited tariff benefits as defined in clause 9 
     of rule XXI.

doc_title: CONGRESSIONAL EARMARKS, LIMITED TAXZ BENEFITS OR LIMITED TARIFF BENEFITS
title: CONGRESSIONAL EARMARKS, LIMITED TAXZ BENEFITS OR LIMITED TARIFF  BENEFITS
